text: Abramovo () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Abramovsky Selsoviet of Arzamassky District, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia. The population was 1383 as of 2010. There are 16 streets. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nizhny Novgorod Oblast Category:Arzamassky Uyezd
title: Abramovo, Arzamassky District, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
